Helix.text:
WHAT: Vision Language Action (VLA) model 
CATEGORY: Humanoid robot 
CAPABILITIES: Autonomous package reorientation, folding laundry, fine manipulation skills 
FEATURES: Multi-fingered hands, end-to-end neural network, natural multimodal interaction 
STAGE: Active 
NOTE: Same architecture used for logistic tasks and laundry folding

company.text:
NAME: Figure 
POSITIONING: General-purpose humanoid intelligence 
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/helix-learns-to-fold-laundry 
NOTE: Hiring for real-world data collection
